4 Ways to Block a Google Account - wikiHow 
 Home Random Browse Articles Add to This Page Add Tip Easy Ways to Help Approve Questions Review Tech Feedback Fix Spelling More Things to Try...   
 Log in / Sign up   
 Desktop Site   
 Talk How to Block a Google Account   
 Blocking a Google account can help prevent that particular user from contacting you via Google+, Google Hangouts, and Gmail. You can block users in Google+ and Google Hangouts directly from your own Google+ account, and can set up filters in Gmail to send unwanted emails directly to the trash folder. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Four: Blocking Using Computer Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0b\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-1.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0b\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-1.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Log in to your Google+ account at  https://plus.google.com/ . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Navigate to the Google+ profile of the user you want blocked. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/08\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/08\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click on the down arrow located next to the user’s profile name. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click on “Report/block. ” 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3c\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3c\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-5.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Place a checkmark in the box next to the name of the user you want blocked. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Click on “Done. ”  That particular user will now be blocked from contacting you in Google+ and Google Hangouts. [1] 
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Four: Blocking Using Android Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e5\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-7.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e5\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-7.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Launch the Google+ app on your Android device. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/02\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-8.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/02\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-8.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Use the search feature at the top of your Google+ session to navigate to the profile of the user you want blocked. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/50\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-9.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/50\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-9.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Tap on the menu button located at the top of the user’s profile to access additional options.  The menu button features three vertical dots.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-10.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-10.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Tap on “Block,” then on “OK. ”  That particular user will now be blocked from contacting you in Google+ and Google Hangouts.
 Advertisement 
 Method Three of Four: Blocking Using iOS Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3a\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-11.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3a\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-11.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Launch the Google+ app on your iOS device. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/92\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-12.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-12.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/92\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-12.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-12.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Tap on the menu icon located at the upper left corner of your Google+ session.  The menu icon features three horizontal lines.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/aa\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-13.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-13.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/aa\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-13.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-13.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Use the search feature to navigate to the profile of the user you want blocked. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9a\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-14.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-14.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9a\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-14.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-14.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Tap on the gear icon at the upper right corner, then select “Block. ”  That particular user will now be blocked from contacting you in Google+ and Google Hangouts.
 Advertisement 
 Method Four of Four: Creating Filters in Gmail Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-15.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-15.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-15.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-15.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Log in to your Gmail account at  https://mail.google.com/ . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/de\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-16.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-16.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/de\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-16.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-16.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Navigate to an email that was sent to you by the person you want blocked. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d9\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-17.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-17.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d9\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-17.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-17.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click on the down arrow located to the right of “Reply. ” 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d5\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-18.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-18.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d5\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-18.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-18.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click on “Filter messages like this. ” 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/43\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-19.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-19.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/43\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-19.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-19.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Verify that the user’s Gmail address displays in the “From” field, then click on “Create filter with this search. ” 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/06\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-20.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-20.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/06\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-20.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-20.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Place a checkmark next to the action you want performed when that particular user sends you an email.  For example, if you want all emails from that user filtered directly to your trash folder, select “Delete it.”
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/c0\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-21.jpg\/v4-460px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-21.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/c0\/Block-a-Google-Account-Step-21.jpg\/v4-760px-Block-a-Google-Account-Step-21.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Click on “Create filter. ”  Going forward, any emails sent to you from that Gmail user will filter directly to your trash folder. [2] 
 Advertisement

 Tips Edit 
 Users you block on Google+ and Google Hangouts will not be notified that you have blocked them; however, they may find out that you’ve blocked them after they notice they are no longer able to contact you using these applications. 
 0 
 Helpful? 
   0 
 Add 
 Warnings Edit 
 Keep in mind that blocking Google accounts will only block those people from viewing your Google profile if they are logged in to the account you blocked. Users who are not signed in, or are signed in to an alternate Google account may still be able to view and access your profile and any public posts.
